name: Bitsearch Audio
description: Bitsearch torrent search - searches both Audiobooks (cat 8) and Other Audio (cat 1/sub 1) - Feb 2026

headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

notes: v1.7.0 Feb 2026: Fixed resultSelector to capture full result cards (~12K chars each)
Seeds/Peers: Uses simplified regex to find font-medium spans inside colored containers
Searches BOTH category 8 (Audiobooks) and category 1/subCategory 1 (Other Audio)
